Thanks for recovering the templates. I need to go now, but will have a good look at them early tomorrow morning.



I appreciate your assistance.






Kind Regards,

Advantage Property Styling

Hi Sharon,

We have recovered the old "2 bed essentials template" and made a new one. Just search for "Template" and it should show up.
Please see the attached. Let me know if this is ok?

Hi Heath,



I think these are the ones I recreated. The original template was created by Joel 29th November. I would like to reinstate the original templates.





Hi Sharon,

We have updated the "proposal-1528" to a template. Try visiting dashboard and search for : "template"
https://proposal.advantagestyling.com.au/

Let me know if this is correct?

and also I assume you guys have created some proposals that needs to be a template? May I know this list so we could convert it to a template?







Kind Regards,



Sharon Goldberg

Assistant to Senior Stylist

Advantage Property Styling



Follow us on:





P 02 9310 1611 | F 02 9316 4600



Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street, BANKSMEADOW NSW 2019

PO Box 7125, ALEXANDRIA NSW 2015



http://www.advantagestyling.com.au/

Hi Sharon, 

Sure, have a look at the attached screen shot... Are these the two templates.
@joel any idea of where we can maybe get these templates from that Sharon mentions?

Hi Heath,



Thank you for getting back to us. I understand the platform has been modified numerous times, and we have sent a lot of requests your way to make changes or adjustments. Thank you for your patience.



We have worked on a manual system for so long now, that we are putting a lot of trust in the automated online quote process. When something goes wrong, there is slight hysteria on our side as we cannot fix it immediately without your teams' assistance. Thank you for your fast response to our requests and for fixing issues with speed. We are looking forward to the new developments and will continue to communicate and "throw" scenarios your way.



On a side note - last year we had a 2 templates for, "Essentials 1 Bedroom" and "Essentials 2 Bedroom". Someone is the office accidently overrode both templates and we are working currently on a version I created. We would prefer to use the 2 templates Dan approved. Can you please upload these again?



Many thanks.






Kind Regards,



Sharon Goldberg

Assistant to Senior Stylist

Advantage Property Styling



Follow us on:





P 02 9310 1611 | F 02 9316 4600



Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street, BANKSMEADOW NSW 2019

PO Box 7125, ALEXANDRIA NSW 2015



http://www.advantagestyling.com.au/

Hi Sharon, 

Thanks for getting back to us. 

Regarding these nuances, the two examples given below have always been in the system. Cat's one on Friday hadn't been noticed previously as there was a discount and markup, I was under the impression that this was a somewhat unique situation. Regarding the one you raised today, the totals were correct, we just hadn't created a line item for the hidden discount in the WordDoc. It was already accounted for in the weekly rental amount.

We are continuing testing of the next release of the platform this week. It has actually been built from the ground up to eliminate many of these quirks. The challenge we have is the current platform has been added to, amended and tweaked over time creating many variables, loops etc. The application of the new design gives us the opportunity to clean up many of the elements, with a focus on a more stable result.

I have already flagged with Dan last week that the next design is on the way and that we will need yourself and the team who use the system daily and understand all of the unique scenarios to test it (i.e. throw everything at it) so that we can make sure it accommodates all requirements. 

Thanks for working with us on these fine tuning elements, rest assured whenever we receive a request from you guys, you are pushed to the front of the queue as we aim to stabilise all of the new features of your portal.

Hi Heath,



The total is now showing correctly on the dashboard. Thanks



Moving forward, we are concerned that some of the calculations are not correct. I am referring to this total being wrong on dashboard today, and Cat's email where an applied discount was not working correctly for "Advantage Plus". It seems like some nuances are happening sporadically for no reason. We are concerned we might miss these errors and send them to the client.



Do you think you can find the root cause and let us know please?






Kind Regards,



Sharon Goldberg

Assistant to Senior Stylist

Advantage Property Styling



Follow us on:





P 02 9310 1611 | F 02 9316 4600



Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street, BANKSMEADOW NSW 2019

PO Box 7125, ALEXANDRIA NSW 2015



http://www.advantagestyling.com.au/

Hi Sharon,

We have updated the dashboard, Can you please check and let me know if the total now is showing correctly?

Hi Heath,


Thank you for including the hidden discount, that is a huge help.


The total is still incorrect on the summary it should be $7,896.40 not $7,106.80









Kind Regards,

Sharon Goldberg

Assistant to Senior Stylist

Advantage Property Styling

Hi Sharon, 

We have now added the hidden discount to the pdf. Can you please review and let me know if it's what you were after?

Hi Heath,

My apologies, I made an error in my first email.

Please ignore the comment in red.

Kind Regards,

Sharon Goldberg

Cc: Jasmine Killey
Subject: FW: [Assistant] Payment Proposal - Unit 4, 82 Milray Avenue Wollstonecraft New South Wales 2065 Australia - ACCEPT PROPOSAL

Good morning Heath,

Hope you had a great weekend. We are having some problems with the following.
· Hidden discounts not appearing on accepted word doc
· Total amount is different on Accepted proposal as opposed to customers signed off PDF version – please see attached
· There a 10% hidden discount applied to the quote. It is not appearing on our final word docs, and also not correct on the quote summary – see screen capture below. It should be $7,896.40




Are you able to fix this today.


Kind Regards,

Sharon Goldberg
Assistant to Senior Stylist
